column1: '''Nathalie Kotowksi''' (12 March 1932<ref>http://www.grijalvo.com/Hfz002/hfz002_b_Nathalie_Kotowski.htm (accessed 06-12-2011)</ref> - 27 August 2001<ref>http://www.jrrvf.com/forum/noncgi/Forum5/HTML/000292.html (accessed 06-12-2011)</ref>) was a Belgian Tolkien collector and author.
Nathalie Kotowski was the founder of [[Belegaer (Tolkien Society)|Belegaer - Cercle d'etudes de Tolkien en Belgique]] as well as editor-in-chief of its magazine ''Cirth De Gandalf''.
Aside from being involved in Belegaer
column2: Nathalie was also underwriter of ''[[Beyond Bree]]'' and a member of [[The Tolkien Society]].<ref>http://www.cep.unt.edu/bree/Back-Issues1.pdf (accessed 06-12-2011)</ref> Nathalie was also occasionally interviewed by the media on the subject of Tolkien.<ref>http://hemeroteca.lavanguardia.com/preview/1997/11/23/pagina-18/34646661/pdf.html?search=Ima%20Sanch%C3%ADs (accessed 06-12-2011)</ref>
